🌵 Streams in the Desert - April 18 🌵

"And he shall bring it to pass" (Ps. 37:5) 🙏

I used to think that after praying, I needed to do everything possible to make the answer happen. But God showed me a better way! 🤗 He taught me that when I try too hard in my own strength, it actually stops Him from working. Now when I pray and truly believe God for something, I wait with a thankful heart ❤️ and only do what He tells me to do.

It feels scary to just sit still and trust God completely! 😅 The temptation to take control ourselves is very strong. But remember:

👉 If a drowning person keeps struggling, the rescuer can't save them. 🌊

👉 In the same way, God can't fight our battles when we keep fighting in our own strength.

It's not that He won't help - He can't help when we don't let Him! 🙌

Spiritual forces cannot work while earthly forces are active. ⚡

🌷 God needs time to answer prayer. We often forget to give Him that time! 🌷

Think about this:

🌸 God takes time to paint a beautiful rose

🌳 God takes time to grow a mighty oak tree

🍞 God takes time to make bread from wheat fields

First He prepares the earth...
Then He softens it...
Then He makes it rich...
He sends rain and dew... 💦
He warms it with sunlight... ☀️
Then comes the green shoot...
Then the stalk...
Then the golden grain...
And finally, bread for hungry people! 🍞

All of this takes time! ⏳

That's why we:
🌱 Plant seeds
👩‍🌾 Work the soil
⏳ Wait patiently
🙏 Trust God
...until His perfect plan is complete! ✔️

We must learn this same lesson about prayer! 💖 God needs time to answer our prayers - just like He needs time to make a rose, an oak tree, or a loaf of bread.

So let's:
✨ Pray with faith
🌈 Wait with patience
🌟 Trust His timing
Because our God always keeps His promises! 🙌

-- C.H.P. & J.H.M.
